# isVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the window is visible onscreen (even when it’s obscured by other windows).

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the window is onscreen (even if it’s obscured by other windows); otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Related Documentation

- **visibleRect**: The portion of the view that isn’t clipped by its superviews.

## Managing Window Visibility and Occlusion State

- **occlusionState**: The occlusion state of the window.
